Basilisk Hide Cloak.Description: A cloak fashioned from the hide of a basilisk, left long ago by a warrior before you. As you don the cloack, you feel it's warmth; it's energy flowing through you.

Fireweed Mail.Description: Armor forged from scrap heated by fireweed.

Flameweed Light Armor.Description: The flameweed tendrils wrap around you, heating you up. You feel warm.

Grizzly Pelt.Description: The silky, dense robe provides you with both warm and a sense of elegancy. But be warned, from elegance arrogance is born.
